caption.p: ( a) SEM images (top) and AFM images (bottom) of the cotton fibers pre (left)- and post (right)-dip-coating; ( b) Drop analysis with various oils and water in air (top) and submerged in water (bottom) of the dip-coated cotton fibers after 1000 abrasion cycles. Reprinted with permission from [ 47], with permission from RSC Publishing, 2019.
